refnamediv.refpurpose: Initializes a stored procedure or a remote stored procedure

refsynopsisdiv.warning:
&warn.removed.function.7-0-0.alternatives;
Using an EXEC query issued through PDO_SQLSRV, PDO_ODBC, SQLSRV, or the unified ODBC driver.

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.parameters;
sp_name
Stored procedure name, like ownew.sp_name or otherdb.owner.sp_name.
link_identifier
A MS SQL link identifier, returned by mssql_connect.

&reftitle.returnvalues;
Returns a resource identifier "statement", used in subsequent calls to mssql_bind and mssql_execute, or &false; on errors.
